ps1.2:8.2_0: Rūpaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.7_0: viññāṇaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.14_0: manaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.21_0: dhamme etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.28_0: manoviññāṇaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.35_0: manosamphassaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:8.42_0: manosamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:9.6_0: dhammasaññaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:9.13_0: dhammasañcetanaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:9.20_0: dhammataṇhaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:9.27_0: dhammavitakkaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:9.34_0: dhammavicāraṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:10.6_0: viññāṇadhātuṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:10.17_0: viññāṇakasiṇaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:11.32_0: matthaluṅgaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:13.18_0: manoviññāṇadhātuṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:14.19_0: paññindriyaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:15.24_0: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:16.12_0: jarāmaraṇaṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti—
ps1.2:18.1_0: Khandhā hetu khandhā paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:19.1_0: Avijjā hetu avijjā paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:20.1_0: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:21.1_0: Saññā hetu saññā paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:22.1_0: Vitakko hetu vitakko paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya, samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:23.1_0: Ayoniso manasikāro hetu ayoniso manasikāro paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:24.1_0: Pāpamitto hetu pāpamitto paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya, samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:25.1_0: Paratoghoso hetu paratoghoso paccayo diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṁ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena—
ps1.2:28.12_0: Ahanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā katihākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:28.13_0: Mamanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā katihākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:29.5_0: Sakkāyavatthukāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā pannarasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.7_0: Antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā paññāsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.10_0: Saññojanikāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.11_0: Ahanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.12_0: Mamanti mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.13_0: Attavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:29.14_0: Lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:30.1_0: Assādadiṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcatiṁsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:30.2_0: Yaṁ rūpaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ rūpassa assādoti—
ps1.2:30.4_0: Diṭṭhi na assādo, assādo na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:30.6_0: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca assādo—
ps1.2:31.3_0: Diṭṭhivipanno puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
ps1.2:31.6_0: Yo diṭṭhiyā rāgo, so na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:31.9_0: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca rāgo—
ps1.2:31.11_0: Tāya ca diṭṭhiyā tena ca rāgena samannāgato puggalo diṭṭhirāgaratto.
ps1.2:31.12_0: Diṭṭhirāgaratte puggale dinnaṁ dānaṁ na mahapphalaṁ hoti na mahānisaṁsaṁ.
ps1.2:32.3_0: Micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ,
ps1.2:32.4_1: yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā,
ps1.2:32.4_2: sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṁvattanti.
ps1.2:32.7_0: Seyyathāpi nimbabījaṁ vā kosātakībījaṁ vā tittakālābubījaṁ vā allāya pathaviyā nikkhittaṁ yaṁ ceva pathavirasaṁ upādiyati,
ps1.2:32.7_2: sabbaṁ taṁ tittakattāya kaṭukattāya asātattāya saṁvattati.
ps1.2:32.10_0: Evamevaṁ micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ,
ps1.2:32.11_1: yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā,
ps1.2:32.11_2: sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṁvattanti.
ps1.2:34.1_0: Atthi saññojanāni ceva diṭṭhiyo ca, atthi saññojanāni na ca diṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:37.34_0: yaṁ manosamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ,
ps1.2:37.36_0: Diṭṭhi na assādo, assādo na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:37.38_0: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca assādo—
ps1.2:38.3_0: Diṭṭhivipanno puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
ps1.2:38.6_0: Yo diṭṭhiyā rāgo, so na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:38.9_0: Yā ca diṭṭhi yo ca rāgo, ayaṁ vuccati diṭṭhirāgo.
ps1.2:38.10_0: Tāya ca diṭṭhiyā tena ca rāgena samannāgato puggalo diṭṭhirāgaratto.
ps1.2:38.11_0: Diṭṭhirāgaratte puggale dinnaṁ dānaṁ na mahapphalaṁ hoti na mahānisaṁsaṁ.
ps1.2:39.3_0: Micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ,
ps1.2:39.4_1: yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā,
ps1.2:39.4_2: sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṁvattanti.
ps1.2:39.7_0: Seyyathāpi nimbabījaṁ vā kosātakībījaṁ vā tittakālābubījaṁ vā allāya pathaviyā nikkhittaṁ yañceva pathavirasaṁ upādiyati yañca āporasaṁ upādiyati,
ps1.2:39.7_1: sabbaṁ taṁ tittakattāya kaṭukattāya asātattāya saṁvattati.
ps1.2:39.10_0: Evamevaṁ micchādiṭṭhikassa purisapuggalassa yañceva kāyakammaṁ yathādiṭṭhi samattaṁ samādinnaṁ yañca vacīkammaṁ …pe…
ps1.2:39.11_1: yā ca cetanā yā ca patthanā yo ca paṇidhi ye ca saṅkhārā,
ps1.2:39.11_2: sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya akantāya amanāpāya ahitāya dukkhāya saṁvattanti.
ps1.2:41.1_0: Atthi saññojanāni ceva diṭṭhiyo ca, atthi saññojanāni na ca diṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:41.8_0: Assādadiṭṭhiyā imehi pañcatiṁsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:42.1_0: Attānudiṭṭhiyā katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:42.2_0: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
ps1.2:42.2_1: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṁ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṁ
ps1.2:42.2_2: vā attānaṁ attani vā rūpaṁ rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ;
ps1.2:42.6_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā viññāṇaṁ viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ps1.2:43.6_0: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—
ps1.2:43.13_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:44.11_0: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci, so vaṇṇo;
ps1.2:44.17_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:45.8_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā iminā rūpena rūpavā”ti.
ps1.2:45.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:45.22_0: So kho pana ayaṁ attā iminā rūpena rūpavā”ti.
ps1.2:45.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:46.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ gandho imasmiṁ pupphe”ti.
ps1.2:46.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:47.8_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imasmiṁ rūpe”ti.
ps1.2:47.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ maṇi imasmiṁ karaṇḍake”ti.
ps1.2:47.22_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imasmiṁ rūpe”ti.
ps1.2:47.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:48.2_0: Idhekacco cakkhusamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ sotasamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ ghānasamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ jivhāsamphassajaṁ
ps1.2:48.2_1: vedanaṁ kāyasamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ manosamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ attato samanupassati.
ps1.2:48.3_0: “Yā manosamphassajā vedanā so ahaṁ, yo ahaṁ sā manosamphassajā vedanā”ti—
ps1.2:48.5_0: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—
ps1.2:48.7_0: Evamevaṁ idhekacco manosamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ attato samanupassati.
ps1.2:48.8_0: “Yā manosamphassajā vedanā so ahaṁ, yo ahaṁ sā manosamphassajā vedanā”ti—
ps1.2:48.11_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:49.8_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya vedanāya vedanāvā”ti.
ps1.2:49.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:49.22_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya vedanāya vedanāvā”ti.
ps1.2:49.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:50.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ gandho imasmiṁ pupphe”ti.
ps1.2:50.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:51.8_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya vedanāyā”ti.
ps1.2:51.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ maṇi imasmiṁ karaṇḍake”ti.
ps1.2:51.22_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya vedanāyā”ti.
ps1.2:51.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:52.8_0: “Yā manosamphassajā saññā so ahaṁ, yo ahaṁ sā manosamphassajā saññā”ti—
ps1.2:52.10_0: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—
ps1.2:52.12_0: Evamevaṁ idhekacco manosamphassajaṁ saññaṁ attato samanupassati.
ps1.2:52.13_0: “Yā manosamphassajā saññā so ahaṁ, yo ahaṁ sā manosamphassajā saññā”ti.
ps1.2:52.16_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:53.8_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya saññāya saññāvā”ti.
ps1.2:53.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:53.22_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya saññāya saññāvā”ti.
ps1.2:53.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:54.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ gandho imasmiṁ pupphe”ti.
ps1.2:54.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:55.8_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya saññāyā”ti.
ps1.2:55.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ maṇi imasmiṁ karaṇḍake”ti.
ps1.2:55.22_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imāya saññāyā”ti.
ps1.2:55.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:56.2_0: Idhekacco cakkhusamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ sotasamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ ghānasamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ jivhāsamphassajaṁ
ps1.2:56.2_1: cetanaṁ kāyasamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ manosamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ attato samanupassati.
ps1.2:56.6_0: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—
ps1.2:56.8_0: Evamevaṁ idhekacco manosamphassajaṁ cetanaṁ attato samanupassati.
ps1.2:56.9_0: “Yā manosamphassajā cetanā so ahaṁ, yo ahaṁ sā manosamphassajā cetanā”ti—
ps1.2:56.12_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:57.8_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imehi saṅkhārehi saṅkhāravā”ti.
ps1.2:57.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:57.22_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā.
ps1.2:57.26_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:58.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ gandho imasmiṁ pupphe”ti.
ps1.2:58.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:59.8_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imesu saṅkhāresū”ti.
ps1.2:59.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ maṇi imasmiṁ karaṇḍake”ti.
ps1.2:59.22_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imesu saṅkhāresū”ti.
ps1.2:59.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:60.10_0: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci so vaṇṇo, yo vaṇṇo sā accī”ti—
ps1.2:60.17_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:61.8_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā iminā viññāṇena viññāṇavā”ti.
ps1.2:61.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:61.22_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā iminā viññāṇena viññāṇavā”ti.
ps1.2:61.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:62.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ gandho imasmiṁ pupphe”ti.
ps1.2:62.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:63.8_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imasmiṁ viññāṇe”ti.
ps1.2:63.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ maṇi imasmiṁ karaṇḍake”ti.
ps1.2:63.22_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā imasmiṁ viññāṇe”ti.
ps1.2:63.25_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:63.32_0: Attānudiṭṭhiyā imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:64.4_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:64.18_2: parañca lokaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī”ti—vatthu.
ps1.2:64.20_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:65.1_0: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:65.2_0: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
ps1.2:65.2_1: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṁ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṁ
ps1.2:65.2_2: vā attānaṁ attani vā rūpaṁ rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ps1.2:65.6_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā viññāṇaṁ viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ps1.2:66.14_0: sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:67.1_0: Sakkāyavatthukāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā katamehi pannarasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:67.2_0: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṁ adassāvī
ps1.2:67.2_1: sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā rūpaṁ rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ps1.2:67.6_0: viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā viññāṇaṁ viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
ps1.2:68.8_0: So kho pana me ayaṁ attā iminā rūpena rūpavā”ti.
ps1.2:68.14_0: So kho panāyaṁ rukkho imāya chāyāya chāyāvā”ti.
ps1.2:68.21_0: sakkāyavatthukāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā imehi pannarasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:69.1_0: Sakkāyavatthukāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:69.2_0: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṁ adassāvī
ps1.2:69.2_1: sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṁ attato samanupassati,
ps1.2:70.12_0: sakkāyavatthukāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:71.1_0: Antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi paññāsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:71.16_0: “hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti …
ps1.2:71.17_0: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:72.3_0: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—

ps1.2:84.11_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:85.8_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.

ps1.2:87.12_0: ayaṁ paṭhamā “na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:88.11_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:89.1_0: “Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:89.2_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:89.4_0: Tathāgato kāyassa bhedā hoti ca na ca hotīti—
ps1.2:89.8_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:89.11_0: ayaṁ paṭhamā “hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:90.5_0: Tathāgato kāyassa bhedā hoti ca na ca hotīti—
ps1.2:90.9_0: “hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:90.10_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:91.1_0: “Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:91.2_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:91.4_0: Tathāgato kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā neva hoti na na hotīti—
ps1.2:91.8_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi, aññā diṭṭhi, aññaṁ vatthu.
ps1.2:91.10_0: ayaṁ paṭhamā “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:92.5_0: Tathāgato kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā neva hoti na na hotīti—
ps1.2:92.9_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:92.12_0: ayaṁ pañcamī “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:92.16_0: “Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:92.17_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi pañcahākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:92.18_0: Antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi paññāsāya ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:95.4_0: saññojanikāya diṭṭhiyā imehi aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.

ps1.2:100.1_0: Attavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:100.2_0: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṁ adassāvī
ps1.2:100.2_1: sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṁ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani
ps1.2:100.6_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ attani vā viññāṇaṁ viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ …pe….
ps1.2:101.7_0: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci, so vaṇṇo;
ps1.2:101.15_0: attavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā imehi vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:102.1_0: Lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā katamehi aṭṭhahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti?
ps1.2:102.4_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:103.2_0: sassato ca asassato ca attā ca loko cāti …pe…
ps1.2:103.3_0: neva sassato nāsassato attā ca loko cāti …
ps1.2:103.6_0: antavā ca anantavā ca attā ca loko cāti …
ps1.2:103.7_0: neva antavā na anantavā attā ca loko cāti abhinivesaparāmāso lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttā diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:103.8_0: Diṭṭhi na vatthu, vatthu na diṭṭhi.
ps1.2:103.14_0: Lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā imehi aṭṭhahi ākārehi abhiniveso hoti.
ps1.2:104.3_0: Assādadiṭṭhiyā pañcatiṁsāya ākārehi abhiniveso kati bhavadiṭṭhiyo, kati vibhavadiṭṭhiyo?
ps1.2:104.4_0: Attānudiṭṭhiyā vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso kati bhavadiṭṭhiyo kati vibhavadiṭṭhiyo …pe…
ps1.2:104.5_0: lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhahi ākārehi abhiniveso kati bhavadiṭṭhiyo kati vibhavadiṭṭhiyo?
ps1.2:105.1_0: Assādadiṭṭhiyā pañcatiṁsāya ākārehi abhiniveso siyā bhavadiṭṭhiyo, siyā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:105.2_0: Attānudiṭṭhiyā vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso pannarasa bhavadiṭṭhiyo, pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:105.3_0: Micchādiṭṭhiyā dasahi ākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:105.4_0: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso pannarasa bhavadiṭṭhiyo, pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:105.5_0: Sakkāyavatthukāya sassatadiṭṭhiyā pannarasahi ākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā bhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:105.6_0: Sakkāyavatthukāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā pañcahākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:106.2_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā pañcahākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā bhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:106.4_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā pañcahākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:106.6_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā pañcahākārehi abhiniveso siyā bhavadiṭṭhiyo, siyā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.

ps1.2:106.14_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā pañcahākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā bhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:106.16_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā pañcahākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:106.17_0: “Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:106.18_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā pañcahākārehi abhiniveso siyā bhavadiṭṭhiyo,
ps1.2:106.18_1: siyā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti—
ps1.2:106.19_0: antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā pañcahākārehi abhiniveso siyā bhavadiṭṭhiyo, siyā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:107.1_0: Pubbantānudiṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso siyā bhavadiṭṭhiyo, siyā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:107.2_0: Aparantānudiṭṭhiyā catucattārīsāya ākārehi abhiniveso siyā bhavadiṭṭhiyo, siyā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:107.3_0: Saññojanikāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso siyā bhavadiṭṭhiyo, siyā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:107.5_0: mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:107.7_0: mānavinibandhāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhārasahi ākārehi abhiniveso sabbāva tā bhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:107.8_0: Attavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā vīsatiyā ākārehi abhiniveso pannarasa bhavadiṭṭhiyo,
ps1.2:107.9_0: Lokavādapaṭisaṁyuttāya diṭṭhiyā aṭṭhahi ākārehi abhiniveso siyā bhavadiṭṭhiyo, siyā vibhavadiṭṭhiyo.
ps1.2:110.1_0: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhitā devamanussā olīyanti eke, atidhāvanti eke;
ps1.2:110.5_0: Tesaṁ bhavanirodhāya dhamme desiyamāne cittaṁ na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
ps1.2:111.2_0: Bhaveneva kho paneke aṭṭīyamānā harāyamānā jigucchamānā vibhavaṁ abhinandanti—
ps1.2:111.3_1: ayaṁ attā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā ucchijjati vinassati na hoti paraṁ maraṇā,
ps1.2:111.3_2: etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ etaṁ yāthāvanti.
ps1.2:112.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhūtaṁ bhūtato passati.
ps1.2:112.3_0: Bhūtaṁ bhūtato disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
ps1.2:112.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cakkhumanto ca passanti.
ps1.2:115.1_0: Tayo puggalā vipannadiṭṭhī, tayo puggalā sampannadiṭṭhī.
ps1.2:115.3_0: Titthiyo ca, titthiyasāvako ca, yo ca micchādiṭṭhiko—
ps1.2:116.2_0: Tathāgato ca, tathāgatasāvako ca, yo ca sammādiṭṭhiko—
ps1.2:121.2_0: kā diṭṭhi, kati diṭṭhiyo, katamantānuggahitā tā diṭṭhiyo?
ps1.2:121.4_0: kā diṭṭhi, kati diṭṭhiyo, katamantānuggahitā tā diṭṭhiyo?
ps1.2:121.6_0: kā diṭṭhi, kati diṭṭhiyo, katamantānuggahitā tā diṭṭhiyo?
ps1.2:123.1_0: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi niṭṭhaṁ gatā, sabbe te diṭṭhisampannā.
ps1.2:123.2_0: Tesaṁ diṭṭhisampannānaṁ pañcannaṁ idha niṭṭhā, pañcannaṁ idha vihāya niṭṭhā.
ps1.2:123.4_0: Sattakkhattuparamassa, kolaṅkolassa, ekabījissa, sakadāgāmissa, yo ca diṭṭheva dhamme arahā—
ps1.2:125.1_0: Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi niṭṭhaṁ gatā, sabbe te diṭṭhisampannā.
ps1.2:125.2_0: Tesaṁ diṭṭhisampannānaṁ imesaṁ pañcannaṁ idha niṭṭhā, imesaṁ pañcannaṁ idha vihāya niṭṭhā.
ps1.2:126.1_0: Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi aveccappasannā, sabbe te sotāpannā.
ps1.2:126.2_0: Tesaṁ sotāpannānaṁ pañcannaṁ idha niṭṭhā, pañcannaṁ idha vihāya niṭṭhā.
ps1.2:126.4_0: Sattakkhattuparamassa, kolaṅkolassa, ekabījissa, sakadāgāmissa, yo ca diṭṭheva dhamme arahā—
ps1.2:128.1_0: Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi aveccappasannā, sabbe te sotāpannā.
ps1.2:128.2_0: Tesaṁ sotāpannānaṁ imesaṁ pañcannaṁ idha niṭṭhā.
